field.name: player
field.label: Player Type
field.description: The type of player to display for this menu item

field.name: default_volume
field.label: Default Volume
field.description: Default volume for player with 0 being silent and 100 being maximum

field.name: auto_start
field.label: Auto Start
field.description: True means it plays automatically when the player is loaded

field.name: loop_play
field.label: Loop Playback
field.description: True means it plays the same file at the end of playing

field.name: random_play
field.label: Random Play
field.description: True means that it randomly plays another song for multiple loaded MP3 players

field.name: timer
field.label: Display Timer
field.description: True displays the duration in mm:ss

field.name: no_cursor
field.label: Disable Cursor
field.description: True disables the cursor on the seek bar

field.name: fading
field.label: Fading
field.description: Seconds between one track and the next track
